source: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_SEQ_00<tab>Aymeric is desperate to fly to Ishgard's defense.
target: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_SEQ_00<tab>Aymeric ist entschlossen, Ishgard zu retten.

source: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_SEQ_01<tab>You and your companions settle upon the backs of Hraesvelgr and his kin, and dive through the clouds in the direction of Ishgard. Soon after, you alight, hands numb and eyes stinging, on the Steps of Faith in the midst of battle. With a mixture of surprise and scorn, Nidhogg welcomes Hraesvelgr, who attempts in vain to persuade his brother from his vengeful course. A mighty clash then ensues between the pair, from which there can be only one victor... The city's defenders watch transfixed as Hraesvelgr tumbles onto the bridge, beaten and bloody, Ishgard's fate seemingly sealed. Triumphant, Nidhogg revels in the moment, only to learn that his fallen sibling has entrusted you with a gift: one half of his power.
target: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_SEQ_01<tab>Hraesvelgr, Vedrfölnir und Vidofnir fliegen euch mit Windeseile nach Ishgard und setzen euch auf Schicksalsweg ab. Dort entbrennt ein gewaltiger Kampf zwischen Nidhogg und seinem Bruder Hraesvelgr. Als Hraesvelgr geschlagen zu Nidhoggs Füßen darnieder liegt, entblößt er eine leere Augenhöhle, denn er hat sein Auge dir geliehen und damit seine ganze Hoffnung auf dich gesetzt. Wirst du Nidhogg bezwingen können?

source:
TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_SEQ_02With Hraesvelgr's might now commingled with your own, you are become Ishgard's best and last hope of staying the rampaging Nidhogg. Slay the great wyrm's shade, and bring an end to a thousand years of fire and blood!

※The Final Steps of Faith can be accessed via the Duty Finder.
target:
TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_SEQ_02Nun hängt alles von dir ab. Wird Ishgard fallen oder wirst du Nidhogg besiegen, Estinien befreien und dem Drachenkrieg ein Ende setzen?

※ Der letzte Schicksalsweg kann über die Inhaltssuche begonnen werden.

source: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_SEQ_03<tab>You have succeeded in subduing Nidhogg's shade. Wrest the wyrm's eyes from Estinien's armor, and rid your companion of Nidhogg's virulent spirit.
target: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_SEQ_03<tab>Du hast das Unvorstellbare geschafft. Du hast Nidhogg besiegt. Befreie nun Estinien von den Drachen<var 16 /var>augen.

source:
TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_SEQ_04Following Alphinaud's lead, you join in the struggle to tear Nidhogg's eyes from Estinien's mail. Using every onze of your strength, you wrestle with the hateful things, arcs of crackling aether enveloping you in agony, but just when the feat appears beyond you, you appear to receive aid from a most unexpected source...

With one final heave, you succeed in separating man and wyrm, and for an instant you glimpse Nidhogg's disembodied spirit, before casting his eyes into the abyss. At long last, it is over. Having done all you can for Estinien, you watch as Ser Aymeric bears him back to Ishgard. Join Alphinaud at the Arc of the Worthy, and discuss the aftermath of the battle.
target: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_SEQ_04<tab>Mit vereinter Kraft reißt ihr Nidhoggs Augen aus Estiniens Rüstung und befreit somit euren Freund. Sprich mit Alphinaud vor dem Bogen des Würdigen.

source: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_SEQ_05<tab>Upon returning to Ishgard, Alphinaud praises you for your victory over Nidhogg's shade. Whatever joy he feels at the dread wyrm's defeat, however, is overshadowed by his concern for the battered Estinien...
target: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_SEQ_05<tab>Nidhoggs Schatten ist endgültig gebannt. Nun bleibt nur noch zu hoffen, dass Estinien überlebt.

source: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_TODO_01<tab>Use the Duty Finder to confront Nidhogg in the Final Steps of Faith.
TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_TODO_02<tab>Use the Duty Finder to confront Nidhogg in the Final Steps of Faith.
TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_AYMERIC_000_005<tab>Ishgard will not last long against Nidhogg and his Horde. We must away!
target: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_AYMERIC_000_005<tab>Beeilung, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Ishgard wird Nidhogg und seiner Drachenschar nicht lange standhalten!

source: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_ALPHINAUD_000_001<tab>I pray we are not too late...
TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_TEMPLEKNIGHTB02245_000_040<tab>You would venture onto the Steps of Faith?
target: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_TEMPLEKNIGHTB02245_000_040<tab>Wirst du Nidhogg auf dem Schicksalsweg die Stirn bieten?

source: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_BELTARDOIS_000_060<tab>The Horde shall break itself upon the bulwark of the Temple Knights!
TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_MARCELAIN_000_061<tab>The Dravanians shall find death at the points of our spears!
TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_LOANNE_000_062<tab>Let the dragons come! We do not fear them!
target: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_LOANNE_000_062<tab>Häretiker und Drachen machen uns keine Angst!

source: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_CHAUNOLLET_000_063<tab>If the price be mine own life, I shall gladly spend it to purchase peace for Ishgard!
target: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_CHAUNOLLET_000_063<tab>Notfalls werde ich mein Leben für Ishgard geben!

source: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_ALPHINAUD_000_050<tab>Through the haze of pain, I swear I sensed─ But no. The past is done, and we must look to the future. At long last, Nidhogg is gone, his foul spirit cast out once and for all. I only pray that Estinien survives the ordeal...
target: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_ALPHINAUD_000_050<tab>Endlich ist Nidhoggs Schatten gebannt! Hoffentlich ist Estinien stark genug ... Er <var 1A 02 /var>muss<var 1A 01 /var> einfach überleben ...

source: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_BELTARDOIS_000_070<tab>I bid you welcome, slayer of Nidhogg! Ever do the gates of Ishgard stand open to our savior!
target: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_BELTARDOIS_000_070<tab>Willkommen, Bezwinger<var 08 E905 ((in)) (()) /var> Nidhoggs! Die Tore Ishgards werden <var 08 E905 ((unserer Retterin)) ((unserem Retter)) /var> ewig offen stehen.

source: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_MARCELAIN_000_071<tab>Warrior of warriors! It is ever a pleasure to see you.
target: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_MARCELAIN_000_071<tab>O welch Freude, dich zu sehen, <var 08 E905 ((Heldin)) ((Held)) /var> Ishgards!

source: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_LOANNE_000_072<tab>The light of the Holy See has faded, and the wyrm's shadow darkens our walls no more. That I would live to witness the passing of one age into the next...
target: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_LOANNE_000_072<tab>Der größenwahnsinnige Papst ist gestürzt und Nidhogg tot. Für Ishgard bricht ein neues Zeitalter an!

source: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_CHAUNOLLET_000_073<tab>Nay, I'll not deny it: without your skill and fortitude, the city would now be ash. Would that more of your adventuring brethren possessed such qualities.
target: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_CHAUNOLLET_000_073<tab>Dass wir die Stadt verteidigen konnten, haben wir nur dir zu verdanken. Ich habe nie viel von euch Abenteurern gehalten, aber du bist jemand Besonderes - du hast Ehre im Leib.

source: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_QUOMONRENTIN_000_074<tab>The Horde is routed, aye, but I will not count this war over until each blackened stone has been replaced.
target: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_QUOMONRENTIN_000_074<tab>Wir haben Nidhoggs Drachen abgewehrt. Aber solange Ishgard nicht wieder instandgesetzt ist, werden uns die Schrecken des Krieges stets deutlich vor Augen stehen.

source: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_GONDELIMBAUD_000_075<tab>'Tis you! The champion who slew Nidhogg! Your deeds shall pass into legend, yet I am honored to speak with you thus in the flesh!
target: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_GONDELIMBAUD_000_075<tab>Du bist doch <var 08 E905 ((die Heldin, die)) ((der Held, der)) /var> Nidhogg bezwungen hat! Im Namen unserer gesamten Einheit danke ich dir. Ohne dich wären wir alle tot.

source: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_VAINCANNET_000_076<tab>The Horde is fled, and there is much cause to celebrate...but I shall keep one eye on the horizon nonetheless.
target: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_VAINCANNET_000_076<tab>Nidhoggs Drachen sind fort. Dennoch müssen wir stets wachsam und gegen weitere Angriffe gewappnet sein.

source:
TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_TESCELINGEON_000_077After centuries of fighting, are we finally at peace...?
Bah! What a mawkish old fool I've become! I must needs return to my duties!
target: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_TESCELINGEON_000_077<tab>Endlich, endlich hat sich unser Traum erfüllt! Ach, ich kann meine Freude kaum bezähmen! Aber nun heißt es anpacken und die Schäden reparieren.

source: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_HANDELOUP_000_078<tab>Though our principal foe lies defeated, we shall continue to keep order inside the walls and protect the citizenry. In that much at least, the duties of the Temple Knights remain unchanged.
target: TEXT_HEAVND104_02245_HANDELOUP_000_078<tab>Die Ordnung wahren und die Sicherheit der Bürger gewährleisten, das ist und war immer unsere Pflicht. Nun müssen wir sie ohne Zögern erfüllen.
